"Add Users with the options below" "Add Boards and Classes" "No Board and Class information yet" "No Accounts Yet"
To add a Board/Class click on "+" above. Board(s)/Class(es) you associate yourself with will appear here. Depending on your role, please add one or more Board(s)/Class(es) you or your wards are connected with to effectively use LessonPot. Each user needs to be associated with at least 1 Board/Class. "Accounts registered with this device will appear here. Multiple Accounts can use the same device. To add an Account, choose from the options below:"
Share Edit Remove Delete Add Syllabus Share Edit Remove Delete Add Syllabus Post to Students with this Syllabus Options

Share Lesson Tap and hold at any level to select \neverybody within
You can register your Account Id and Password here. This helps you to add yourself to an alternate device as an existing LessonPot user. It results in flexibility of operating from multiple devices and helps you to continue using LessonPot even if your primary device becomes inaccessible. You can register additional phone numbers from which you can access your LessonPot account by inputting them here. Use the + button at the top to add a new number. Note that once a phone number is registered, you will need to access LessonPot on that phone to remove yourself if needed. Phone Numbers: Registered Board(s)/Class(es) can only have their school information modified. To delete a Board/Class, go to the Library Main Screen. Account Id updated successfully
Remove Account will be removed from this phone. In case you want to add the Account back later, you will need an Account Id which is to be configured through the "My Account" screen. Do you want to proceed?
Delete Board/Class Once you delete this Board/Class, all Subjects and all lessons that have been created or received within it will be removed.
Delete Subject Once you delete this Subject, all lessons that have been created or received within it will be removed.
Hold and drag to change order Filter Lessons Apply Remove Filter Edit Filter Support
How to get my Syllabus Right! Syllabus consists of the your Boards-Classes and the Subjects in each Board-Class\n\n You can add Boards and Classes from your Profile page, and you can delete them on the Library screen\n\n To get the right subjects and the right version of those subjects, you can do one of the following:\n\n 1. Take syllabus from a Lesson received\n\n 2. Take syllabus from a Connection\n\n 3. Take syllabys from a Wizard\n\n 4. Click the syllabus Help button I need Syllabus Help! Ways to get Syllabus Accurate
Go to camera
Go to gallery
